content: Forms | TemplatesWe resolved the error users attempting to utilize templates with dynamic fields were seeing.  Internal Referrals | FilteringWe resolved an issue that was causing errors when standard users in large organizations filtered My Referrals and Referrals History tables.  Connect | Direct Messages PerformanceWe released performance improvements to alleviate longer load times for large campaigns.
title: Release Notes | Week of May 1 | Apricot 7.142.1
